channel.title: Installation on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: ps_shoppingcart - Upgrade
item.description: ps_shoppingcart - Upgrade Details Component : ps_shoppingcart Status : Approved Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-681 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to back office -> Modules -> Module manager and search ps_shoppingcart The module page should be displayed and module ps_shoppingcart should appear in the module page
